text: The 2015 Ukrainian Cup Final is a football match that will be played on 4 June 2015 in Kiev. The match is the 24th Ukrainian Cup Final and is contested by Cup holders Dynamo Kyiv and Shakhtar Donetsk, making it part of the National Classic football game. == Road to Kiev == All 14 Ukrainian Premier League clubs do not have to go qualify to enter the competition; Dynamo and Shakhtar therefore both qualified automatically. {|width=100% |width=50% valign=top| Dynamo Kyiv {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 80%;" |- |Round 1||align=right|Obolon-Brovar Kyiv||0 - 1||Shakhtar Donetsk |- |Round 2 (1st leg)||align=right|Poltava||1 - 5||Shakhtar Donetsk |- |Round 2 (2nd leg)||align=right|Shakhtar Donetsk||4 - 1 ||Poltava |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(Shakhtar won 9-2 on aggregate) |- |Quarter-final (1st leg)||align=right|Metalist Kharkiv||0 - 2||Shakhtar Donetsk |- |Quarter- final (2nd leg)||align=right|Shakhtar Donetsk||1 - 0||Metalist Kharkiv |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(Shakhtar won 3-0 on aggregate) |- |Semi-final (1st leg)||align=right|Dnipro||0 - 1||Shakhtar Donetsk |- |Semi-final (2nd leg)||align=right|Shakhtar Donetsk||1 - 1||Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(Shakhtar won 2-1 on aggregate) |} |} == Previous encounters == This will be the eighth Ukrainian Cup Final between the two teams and repeat of last years Cup Final. Dynamo has defeated Shakhtar five times out of the seven Cup Finals. Dynamo had appeared in 13 Cup Finals winning 10 trophies and opponents Shakhtar had appeared in 14 Cup Finals winning 9. ==Match== ===Details=== {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top"
